Blue Ridge Brawl 2019 Preliminary Event Schedule

{% assign sorted_days = site.data.brb.schedule | sort %} {% for day in sorted_days %}

{% comment %} day[0] gets the name of the file, which is the date (must be YEAR-MONTH-DAY) {% endcomment %} {% comment %} See https://learn.cloudcannon.com/jekyll/date-formatting/ for date formatting {% endcomment %} {{ day[0] | date: "%A, %B %e, %Y" }}

{% comment %} day[1] gets the data from the file, which is the schedule {% endcomment %} {% for event in day[1] %} {% endfor %}
{{ event.time }} {{ event.description }}
